Friendly and personal service .The staff were all very friendly and helpful and no request for assistance was a problem for them. The hotel is well situated, being close to shopping, transport, and the tourist sites. We would definitely stay there again.

Lovely hotel and staff. Breakfast was enjoyable and had a good selection with attentive staff. Received good recommendations for food. Room was clean with the essentials. Hotel central, everything we needed for a short visit to Helsinki.

Very decent for a short city break. Excellent location, central and well connected with tram/metro. Staff was welcoming, I arrived on a bank holiday and they gave me a leaflet with everything that was open. Ability to store your luggage after check-out. Great wifi. Breakfast buffet better than expected. Room basic but clean and comfortable.

Great hotel. Everything was nice. Me and my colleagues would surely choose it again next time we visit Helsinki. Great location, great service, friendly staff. Good value for the money. Breakfast was delicious. Very comfortable. Would definitely recommend Thank you!

Excellent hotel. Great service.The room was very spacious, clean, and had the amenities we needed. Breakfast was delicious and with many choices; it was a very wide buffet spread. The people in the reception were very helpful, not just on checkin and checkout, but also in giving directions to spots. The location is great- very near Central Train Station. I would recommend to friends, and will definitely stay again if Im back in Helsinki

Great central location .I stayed at Hotel Arthur for a night, really enjoyed its location in the city centre where everything is within walking distance. The staff was very helpful, breakfast really delicious, and the room nice. I appreciated the luggage room option as well.

Room was just for my needs for this type of staycation. Suprisingly fun jazz evening with good tapas table and nice wines. Hotels location is perfect and breakfast really ok with warm dishes and good coffee. What else do you need?

Beautiful stay! Hotel Arthur is a perfect place to stay in Helsinki. It is close to the center and the railway station. The room was very pleasant, it was cozy and clean. Breakfast was excellent and incredibly varied. The hotel team has always been friendly, patient and helpful. That impressed me the most. No matter what time of day or night, you could turn to them with all your concerns. On my next stays, I will definitely check into Hotel Arthur again. The price performance ratio is very good.
The hotel room was clean, nice and spacious. Breakfast offered with a wide variety of food. The staff were friendly and helpful. The location is just perfect for a walk around the city centre.

Homely friendly hotel .Only stayed 2 nights but the hotel has standard rooms and very clean. All the staff from reception to restaurant were really friendly.It is vey central and walking distance of all local shops cafes and restaurants.Helsinki is a beautiful historic city with lots of amazing architecture to view whilst walking to your destination.

Hospitality, kindness, cleanliness ans service were there as expected. I can only advise you to continue this way same if it would be nice to offer some croissants and pains au chocolats at the breakfast… Be sure if I had to come back in Helsinki in the future, I’ll come back there ! And I’d recommand certainly your Hôtel.

We stayed for 3 nights there,great location, the room was spacious, the people working at the reception very kind and helpful, breakfast was very good!! (But no croisant!!) Close to center,metro and railway station, 2 shopping centers (about 6-7 min walking),supermarket.I recomend it!!

Very friendly staff, basic room but had everything you need, clean and tidy and good value for money considering the central location and the fact this is Helsinki. Had breakfast delivered to my room and it was absolutely fabulous. They called to ask what I would like and delivered beyond expectations.
